abstract: The Lloyds Banking Group plans to cut 270 jobs at its insurance and offshore operations, bringing to more than 4,450 the number of positions the bank has eliminated since April.
snippet: The Lloyds Banking Group plans to cut 270 jobs at its insurance and offshore operations, bringing to more than 4,450 the number of positions the bank has eliminated since April.
lead_paragraph: Total, the French oil company, has signed an agreement to jointly develop a natural gas field on the Yamal Peninsula in a gas-rich area of the Russian Arctic. Total and Novatek, a private Russian gas company, agreed to invest $900 million in the Termokarstovoye gas condensate field at a ceremony attended by Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin, a leader who closely monitors energy deals with foreign companies in Russia.
